{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:53.739
    | text      = They went country by country, and the excess casualties were twice the reported casualties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:00.780
    | text      = I think that's probably what has happened here in the United States.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:05.219
    | text      = As of today, we're being told it's only 64,000 people who are dead.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:10.579
    | text      = Well, excess casualties, no one's given us a figure on that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:14.460
    | text      = My guess is it's twice what we are being told, and these officials at CDC and many of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:23.300
    | text      = others are just downplaying what we are really facing, Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:29.820
    | text      = Most experts who have commented on the situation with the coronavirus have said that in all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:33.300
    | text      = likelihood, the numbers that we have are underestimating the actual number of deaths as opposed to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.219
    | text      = overestimating them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:38.820
    | text      = I'm not sure if the conclusion that Boyle is coming to here is accurate, but it's worth
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:42.539
    | text      = pointing out that what he's saying is a direct contradiction of the things that Alex claimed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:46.619
    | text      = to know for a fact earlier.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:49.780
    | text      = Earlier in the episode, he reported that the CDC was admitting that they'd exaggerated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:53.019
    | text      = their death count by doubling it, but here Boyle is saying that it's probably the exact
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:56.380
    | text      = opposite.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:57.380
    | text      = Both of them are dealing with a factor of two.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:59.699
    | text      = Let's not worry about how they're using the math.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:02.139
    | text      = It's either one half or twice as much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:04.099
    | text      = It's the same basic concept.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:05.420
    | text      = So the Financial Times article he's referencing looked into statistics of how many more deaths
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:09.579
    | text      = had been reported in the week ending April 17th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:13.780
    | text      = From the article, quote, in that week, 22,351 deaths were registered in England and Wales,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:19.940
    | text      = according to the Office for National Statistics, the highest figure since comparable weekly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:24.860
    | text      = data started in 1993 and worse than any figure in similar data of the past 50 years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:31.260
    | text      = The average for the comparable week from 2015 to 2019 was 10,497.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:38.079
    | text      = From that data, there's a conversation that seems to suggest the death toll might be much
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:42.239
    | text      = higher than is being reported in England and Wales, with a total of 27,015 more deaths
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:48.460
    | text      = than the five-year average being between the beginning of March and April 17th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:54.000
    | text      = It's too premature to draw too many conclusions from this data, but it's definitely notable
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:58.420
    | text      = and something that demands further exploration.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:01.119
    | text      = This article doesn't go through it country by country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:03.880
    | text      = It's just about the discrepancy that the Financial Times found in England and Wales.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:07.739
    | text      = However, there was a separate Financial Times article that looked at the overall fatalities
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:12.420
    | text      = during March and April across 14 different countries.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:16.380
    | text      = This article was published on April 26th and found 122,000 excess deaths in these countries,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:22.639
    | text      = as compared to the average number of expected deaths during that time frame.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:26.579
    | text      = This was compared to the approximately 77,000 reported COVID-19 deaths at that time, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:32.019
    | text      = they suggest could mean that the official numbers are pretty low.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:35.980
    | text      = They go on to suggest that if this same pattern of underreporting were to be universal across
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:39.900
    | text      = the world, there could be as many as 117,000 unreported COVID-19 deaths that we're not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:45.039
    | text      = capturing in official statistics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:47.539
    | text      = This again is something that needs further study, but it's definitely hard to look at
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:51.539
    | text      = some of the data they present about how much higher the number of deaths are in various
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:55.440
    | text      = places than the normal average numbers, and even higher than the average plus the official
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:00.400
    | text      = COVID-19 count, and not think that something's being missed there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:04.920
    | text      = It's tough to explain, but it requires further explanation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:10.000
    | text      = It's hard not to account for the extreme political desire that people would have for underreporting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:18.619
    | text      = Like in the two eyes and three nays of a report, it does seem like they're blaming China for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:29.940
    | text      = withholding information about that and trying to downplay the severity of the threat as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:35.159
    | text      = though that is exactly what Trump did at the same time, almost simultaneously.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:41.760
    | text      = The idea that these two governments are going to report things honestly is utterly... You
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:51.260
    | text      = can't believe it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:52.360
    | text      = It's simply not possible to believe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:54.840
    | text      = Maybe it is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:56.099
    | text      = Maybe they are reporting it, but believing it without absolute information seems ridiculous.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:02.099
    | text      = They've lost all benefit of the doubt in regards to lying directly to our faces.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:06.880
    | text      = Speaking of people who don't have the benefit of the doubt working in their favor, we got
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:10.000
    | text      = Alex Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:11.000
    | text      = Hey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:12.000
    | text      = Here's the last clip from May 3rd, and it's Alex talking about his cannibalism comments
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:16.579
    | text      = more.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:17.579
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:18.579
    | text      = And this one really set me off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:19.579
    | text      = Ladies and gentlemen, Alex Jones here, and I don't try to get up here and say sensational
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:24.119
    | text      = things just to say it when I'm covering serious news.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:27.460
    | text      = Sometimes I do satire, like last Tuesday I got picked up Friday was the number one thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:31.659
    | text      = on Twitter for two days, where I said, I'm not going to eat people's children during
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:34.880
    | text      = a collapse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:35.880
    | text      = I'm going to eat my neighbors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:36.880
    | text      = Then I went on to explain I was doing a Jonathan Swift allegory, but the-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:42.880
    | text      = Oh, did you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:43.880
    | text      = Oh, did you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:44.880
    | text      = A minute of it out of context.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:45.880
    | text      = But I knew they'd do that, and people then came and found the truth of what I was talking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:48.840
    | text      = about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:49.840
    | text      = So Jordan, I'm sorry about this in advance, but like I said, that clip really set me off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:53.239
    | text      = Oh, shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:54.239
    | text      = I'm set off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:55.239
    | text      = That is such a brazen act of gaslighting that it triggered a bit of a pointless exercise
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:58.920
    | text      = and literary criticism that we're about to embark on that I view as equal parts illuminating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:04.639
    | text      = and completely pointless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:05.760
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:06.760
    | text      = I went back and listened to the entire cannibalism rant again, and at no point did Alex ever
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:10.519
    | text      = say that he was suggesting he'd eat neighbors instead of eating children.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:13.699
    | text      = That is absolutely not a part of his rant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:15.320
    | text      = He's just making that up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:16.320
    | text      = Also, at no point did he say he was doing a Swift-style allegory or whatever he's pretending
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:20.760
    | text      = now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:21.760
    | text      = That's bullshit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:22.760
    | text      = He says it multiple times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:23.760
    | text      = He says, I'm not joking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:24.760
    | text      = No, he says it multiple times, and when he does say that he's joking, he's saying it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:28.400
    | text      = very obviously to suggest that he's not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:31.400
    | text      = So I was listening back to it, and I kind of realized that if we accept what Alex is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:35.000
    | text      = saying, that it was satire, it's essentially impossible to discern what his point was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:40.519
    | text      = That's because the approximately four-minute rant has a number of tonal shifts within it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:45.019
    | text      = where he's talking about this theme of eating people from completely different standpoints.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:50.019
    | text      = It starts with him talking about how in the Great Depression, people were more self-sufficient
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:53.559
    | text      = than we are now, and as we know, Alex believes that fake statistic about seven million people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:58.559
    | text      = starving in the Great Depression, which he doesn't bring up, but it's clearly in his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:02.280
    | text      = mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:03.440
    | text      = This is where things begin, at which point he says that he's willing to eat his neighbors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:08.079
    | text      = This is clearly meant to be a declaration of how tough and survival-ready he is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:12.159
    | text      = There's clearly nothing more to the conversation at the beginning than this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:15.820
    | text      = He's clear that this is about his children not starving and whatnot, but it's all just
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:19.519
    | text      = I'll kill and eat humans to survive type bragging.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:23.880
    | text      = It's conversation about how he's been looking at his neighbors and wondering if he would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:27.900
    | text      = kill and eat them, and he's decided he will.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:31.199
    | text      = This section of the rant could be seen as satire, possibly, of how stupid preppers are,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:36.119
    | text      = and how they have these survival fantasies that are more based on things they want to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:39.400
    | text      = live out as opposed to realistic scenarios that may come to pass, but I don't think that's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:43.800
    | text      = the intent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:44.800
    | text      = There's zero chance that this section of the rant could be interpreted as any other kind
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:48.219
    | text      = of satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:49.219
    | text      = There's just nothing going on there other than violent fantasy ranting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:53.579
    | text      = This goes on for about a minute and a half, before Alex gets a light in his eye and shifts
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:58.199
    | text      = things, saying, that's why I want you globalists to know I'll eat your ass first.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:03.480
    | text      = This section of the rant completely abandons the idea of feeding his hungry children, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:07.360
    | text      = now eating people has become a specifically violent act.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:10.639
    | text      = He mumbles his murder fantasies about getting his hands around globalist throats and said
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:15.280
    | text      = he's going to eat them because they didn't accept Christ.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:18.360
    | text      = It's clearly cannibalism that's meant as a punishment, where Alex is the instrument of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:22.880
    | text      = punishment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:23.920
    | text      = During this section, the notion of eating people for sustenance is completely forgotten.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:28.400
    | text      = He did forget that, then it went from defensive to offensive very quickly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:33.960
    | text      = About 40 seconds later, he returns to the idea of his children starving, so he's spinning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:38.139
    | text      = two plates at the same time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:40.139
    | text      = He's ranting about eating his neighbor to feed his children, and also eating a globalist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:43.880
    | text      = as a religious punishment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:45.960
    | text      = At that point, Alex says you could, quote, take this as a metaphysical hypothetical,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:51.559
    | text      = but it's not really, and he says that we need to get over the jokes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:03:56.139
    | text      = Alex is bad with words, so metaphysical hypothetical in this context probably just means hypothetical.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:01.800
    | text      = He's expressing that this is not hypothetical.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:03.840
    | text      = It would be like if there was a line in A Modest Proposal where Swift just throws in,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:07.920
    | text      = I know this sounds like satire, but it's not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:11.320
    | text      = Hold on, guys, real quick, act break.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:13.400
    | text      = I was going to put this in as a David Foster Wallace footnote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:17.960
    | text      = Right, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:18.960
    | text      = It's a convoluted influence, and it serves to muddy the performance considerably if he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:23.159
    | text      = actually has some kind of intent behind it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:26.079
    | text      = After Alex says that he's serious, he rambles about how actuary show that after seven days
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:30.400
    | text      = everyone kills for food, and after 14 most people are cannibals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:34.239
    | text      = This is the introduction of a made-up thing, but it's something that's very real in Alex's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:38.480
    | text      = world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:39.480
    | text      = He's using sources that are real to him and his audience to justify the act of eating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:43.400
    | text      = people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:44.820
    | text      = Alex says that he would commit suicide before eating people, but his children are his quote
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:47.920
    | text      = weak place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:49.079
    | text      = So now we're back to this being about eating his neighbor to feed his kids, and it appears
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:53.519
    | text      = the entire section about eating a globalist to show them how they're wrong about God is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:04:56.880
    | text      = supposed to be ignored, which is not the mark of a master craftsman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:00.519
    | text      = Then, 30 seconds later, Alex gets back to punishment cannibalism, talking about how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:05.920
    | text      = the spirit cookers out there are drinking blood and how he's going to drink THEIR blood.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:10.559
    | text      = He says that he'll cut them into filet mignon before watching his daughters starve, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:14.559
    | text      = is weird because now these two different contexts of eating people are getting mingled together
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:20.199
    | text      = when they're very different ideas that he's been juggling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:23.280
    | text      = From this point on through the rest of the rant, nothing makes sense, because it's two
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:26.840
    | text      = different discrete ideas that are being combined.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:29.960
    | text      = There's the notion of eating his neighbor for survival, and the notion of relishing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:33.360
    | text      = eating a globalist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:34.800
    | text      = These are not the same ideas, but they're being combined, so he's saying he'll barbecue
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:38.639
    | text      = your leftist ass so the kids won't starve.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:41.599
    | text      = It's convoluted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:43.039
    | text      = This kind of only makes sense if his neighbor is also a globalist that he's going to eat
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:46.719
    | text      = his punishment, but only once he runs out of his storable food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:51.199
    | text      = That's another point as to why this isn't satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:54.119
    | text      = Alex explicitly says that he won't have to eat his neighbor for a few years because he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:57.719
    | text      = has a lot of storable food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:05:59.880
    | text      = If this truly was something that was meant to be swifty and satire, how does that element
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:04.099
    | text      = factor into it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:05.400
    | text      = According to Alex's own narratives, by the time he's out of survival food, the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:08.760
    | text      = in the developing world will not need to be helped in any way.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:12.320
    | text      = It'll be too late at that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:13.320
    | text      = They will have already eaten each other, because they don't all have storable food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:17.440
    | text      = The crisis that he's talking about is already past the point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:21.039
    | text      = Man, in two years this is going to be such good satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:23.840
    | text      = And even if any of this is connected, a couple years down the road he eats his neighbor because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:28.559
    | text      = he's run out of storable food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:30.480
    | text      = That does nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:32.760
    | text      = It'll save the hungry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:34.239
    | text      = Yeah, there's absolutely nothing to help out people in the developing world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:39.480
    | text      = Oh, thank god Alex ate his neighbor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:41.280
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:42.280
    | text      = Or a globalist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:43.280
    | text      = No, no, no, you gotta understand, Dan, it's just like Bruce Lee and Jeet Kune Do, you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:47.480
    | text      = have to attack while defending and defend while attacking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:51.239
    | text      = That's the trick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:52.239
    | text      = You're saving your daughter's life and you're punishing the globalists all at the same time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:55.800
    | text      = Doesn't work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:56.800
    | text      = Brilliant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:06:57.800
    | text      = So that detail, though, of I won't have to do this for a few years because I've got survival
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:01.039
    | text      = food, that's a fingerprint that Alex is just spitballing and making shit up as he goes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:04.679
    | text      = along.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:05.679
    | text      = He realizes in the middle of his violent rant that he sells storable food, so he needs a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:09.659
    | text      = caveat or else he might get a phone call from my patriot supply asking him why he's promoting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:14.219
    | text      = a different disaster nutritional plan when he's a paid shill for them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:18.659
    | text      = You can kind of tell that's what's going on there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:21.400
    | text      = So at the end of the rant, Alex says what comes closest to being what I think he thinks
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:25.599
    | text      = is poignant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:27.320
    | text      = He says that, quote, before I live off starving Africans and Latin Americans, I swear to God
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:32.239
    | text      = I will eat one of the globalists on a spit, before doing his throw to commercial making
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:36.440
    | text      = fun of the idea that people call him a performance artist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:40.280
    | text      = The performance artist thing, taken in the context of Alex's show, is meant to be a signifier
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:44.880
    | text      = that he's not a performance artist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:47.280
    | text      = It began in his custody hearing a few years back when his lawyer argued in court that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:50.679
    | text      = his show should not be used to determine custody because on air he's playing a character.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:55.360
    | text      = Alex got mad about that, and since then he's gotten really defensive when people say he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:07:59.239
    | text      = a performance artist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:00.519
    | text      = So when he goes to break saying something like that, winkingly saying I'm a performance
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:04.400
    | text      = artist, I'm as fake as they come, regular listeners know exactly what that's code for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:09.059
    | text      = As to the idea of that last line being about starving people in the developing world in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:12.599
    | text      = Africa and Latin America, that's cool, but it doesn't relate to literally anything he's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:17.159
    | text      = said up to that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:18.699
    | text      = You can't just tag an unrelated line on the end of something and then pretend that everything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:22.520
    | text      = before it relates when it doesn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:25.399
    | text      = Also what does living off starving Africans and Latin Americans mean to Alex?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:29.359
    | text      = It would be interesting to hear him explore that concept, and wrestle with how he could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:34.079
    | text      = have ever supported politicians who use fiscal arguments to decrease both foreign aid as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:38.699
    | text      = well as nutritional assistance programs domestically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:41.319
    | text      = I'd like to see him discuss this a little bit more.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:43.439
    | text      = Hey, Ron Paul doesn't want to eat people from developing nations, he just wants them to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:48.159
    | text      = starve on their own two feet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:50.359
    | text      = Pull yourselves up by your own cannibalism, Dan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:53.560
    | text      = That's what Ron Paul was really all about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:55.239
    | text      = Anyway, this critical reading has gone on far too long, but I just realized when I re-listened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:08:59.619
    | text      = to the rant that one of the primary reasons that it fails as both a straightforward argument
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:03.720
    | text      = as well as in terms of satire is because it has no consistent theme to what cannibalism
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:08.000
    | text      = means in the context of the speech.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:10.619
    | text      = This is a really important aspect to why some satire, like a modest proposal, works, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:15.399
    | text      = this doesn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:16.399
    | text      = If Swift had spent part of his pamphlet arguing politely that people should eat poor children
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:21.159
    | text      = to eliminate poverty, and also had chunks where he descended into fantasies about how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:24.880
    | text      = you could eat those kids because fuck them, no one would hold that up as a coherent piece
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:28.659
    | text      = of writing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:30.119
    | text      = Satire is intensely difficult, because it requires a precision that most people aren't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:33.640
    | text      = capable of, and you can definitely count Alex among such people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:37.520
    | text      = I am furious that the right wing even knows the word satire, because they are incapable
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:43.680
    | text      = of it, and yet they keep trying to use it as though they know what it means.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:48.460
    | text      = You guys don't have any fucking clue what satire is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:51.600
    | text      = It's fascinating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:52.600
    | text      = You are satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:53.600
    | text      = It is impossible to parody you, because you are parodies of yourselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:09:58.439
    | text      = You embody the thing that you are incapable of understanding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:02.060
    | text      = It's infuriating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:03.199
    | text      = Which could be satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:05.319
    | text      = I mean, if I wrote Alex's rant as a satire of him, then yes, that would make sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:13.479
    | text      = But even then, I would do it poorly, because I would try and have a consistent theme.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:17.359
    | text      = Well, that wouldn't be the shape it would take, probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:20.960
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:21.960
    | text      = And I really did sit with this for a long time last night, really trying to figure out
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:27.060
    | text      = a way to fix it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:28.720
    | text      = Like fix his rant, and make it- Do some punch-up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:31.479
    | text      = But I really couldn't come up with a coherent way that you bridge the gap.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:38.399
    | text      = What he's trying to say is, instead of satire, publicity stunt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:43.960
    | text      = What he's trying to say is, I did something as a spectacle in order to get eyes on my
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:48.920
    | text      = product.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:49.920
    | text      = And then he's rationalizing it by saying, what I really wanted people to pay attention
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:53.760
    | text      = when they came was me talking about people who are starving in the developing world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:10:58.680
    | text      = He's trying to say that it's satire, but it's really just, I yelled into a bullhorn.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:04.199
    | text      = It's not satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:05.899
    | text      = He's a disingenuous opportunist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:08.260
    | text      = That's the opposite of satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:10.119
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:11.119
    | text      = So the fourth Monday comes around, and this episode's trash.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:14.159
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:15.159
    | text      = Elizabeth's really not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:16.159
    | text      = On Star Wars Day?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:17.159
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:18.159
    | text      = May the fourth was not with him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:19.159
    | text      = How is that possible?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:20.159
    | text      = Or however you phrase that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:21.159
    | text      = Yeah, it's bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:22.159
    | text      = It's really bad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:23.159
    | text      = And guess what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:24.479
    | text      = We start in familiar territory.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:26.359
    | text      = Now let me get into this, because I want to cover this right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:28.880
    | text      = Cannibalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:29.880
    | text      = It was a big controversy when I came out last Tuesday, and I was going along with a satire.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:37.520
    | text      = Going along with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:38.520
    | text      = 1730s, saying he would eat Irish children because the Irish were subhuman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:42.720
    | text      = Because no one was taking care of the Irish, it was overtaxing them and over-regulating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:46.760
    | text      = them, and they were starving to death.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:48.520
    | text      = Over-regulating the Irish.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:49.520
    | text      = Because he was Irish.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:50.520
    | text      = He said, how about we just start eating the Irish babies?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:54.840
    | text      = And he published it like it was serious, and it's the most famous satire in the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:11:58.899
    | text      = So I did a whole piece showing real articles from the UN, about 30 plus million starving
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:03.800
    | text      = to death right now, 135 million starving to death.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:06.479
    | text      = I played the head of the World Food Program talking about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:10.439
    | text      = And then I said, well fine, once all the food runs out, I'll just eat my liberal neighbors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:16.920
    | text      = Knowing they'd pick it up, but they edited it down to one minute, I did it to draw attention
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:21.279
    | text      = to the starvation, because when the first world collapses, the third world dies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:26.479
    | text      = That's a catch phrase that Alex is trying to push on this episode pretty clearly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:30.260
    | text      = And also, again, Alex knows nothing about Swift.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:32.600
    | text      = Like if anything, he wanted higher regulation of the poor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:36.060
    | text      = He wrote that proposal to give badges to the beggars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:40.479
    | text      = That is specifically a control regulation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:42.819
    | text      = In some ways, he was asking for the mark of the beast to be applied to the beggars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:47.079
    | text      = He did not like the poor at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:49.159
    | text      = From that proposal to give badges pamphlet, quote, as a great part of our public miseries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:53.880
    | text      = is originally owing to our own faults, so I am confident that among the meaner people,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:59.880
    | text      = 19 in 20 of those who were reduced to starving condition did not become so by what lawyers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:05.399
    | text      = call the work of God, either upon their bodies or goods, but merely from their own idleness
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:10.279
    | text      = attended with all manner of vices, particularly drunkenness, thievery, and cheating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:15.119
    | text      = He has disdain for the poor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:17.640
    | text      = There was one of my favorite lines, there's a really good book called Futuristic Violence
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:22.939
    | text      = in Fancy Suits by David Wong, and one of my favorite lines is when the main character
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:28.359
    | text      = just says, the rich always think they can starve the poor into the behavior that they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:33.479
    | text      = want.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:34.479
    | text      = It's just such that kind of shit of like, if we just fuck them over enough, they'll
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:39.260
    | text      = do what we say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:40.720
    | text      = And for Swift, it was, they'll wear the badges.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:42.439
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:43.439
    | text      = Or whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:44.439
    | text      = Exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:45.439
    | text      = And let's not even get into the topic of Jonathan Swift's feelings about foreign beggars, who
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:49.079
    | text      = he calls evil in an infestation, and suggests they be, quote, driven or whipped out of town.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
